property.description: A comma separated list of services where service name should only contain a-zA-Z0-9_ and can not start with numbers
property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services

property.description: Environment variables that containers may override rather than use NodeManager's default.
property.name: yarn.nodemanager.env-whitelist

property.description: Whether to enable log aggregation. Log aggregation collects each container's logs and moves these logs onto a file-system, for e.g. HDFS, after the application completes. Users can configure the "yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir" and "yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir-suffix" properties to determine where these logs are moved to. Users can access the logs via the Application Timeline Server.
property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable

property.description: How long to keep aggregation logs before deleting them. -1 disables. Be careful set this too small and you will spam the name node.
property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds
